column4: I'm running Ubuntu 6.06 with 2.6.15-25-k7 #1 SMP PREEMPT; when the machine is under high I/O load (prozilla combining downloads from multiple streams) the machine literally pauses and won't start new processes until it's finished.  I'm previously a Gentoo user and never had this problem before and wouldn't expect it from a dual core machine.  Is there some setting I need to change on Ubuntu or some other Kernel that may be b
it's very strange that the drive wouldn't show up at all... Does it work windows?
Wrong person, I'm after problems with a kernel and high I/O load
